title: Investments by National Banks, Country Districts for United States
notes:
Monthly Coverage Varies Form Year To Year. Except For 1874, Which Only Has Data For October And December, All Years 1875-1913 Have Scattered Five Month Coverage. Six Months Are Presented For 1914. Investments Called "Other Stocks And Bonds" Or "Other Bonds, Securities, Etc." In Source. Source: Computed By NBER From Figures In Annual Reports Of The Comptroller Of The Currency.

This NBER data series m14038 appears on the NBER website in Chapter 14 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter14.html.

NBER Indicator: m14038
